contents: 1. leaves 1b-3b: Urjūzah fī bayān aḥwāl al-ṣalāh.
2. leaves 3b-5b: [Masāʼil concerning ritual prayer from al-Sirāj al-wahhāj sharḥ al-Qudūrī].
3. leaves 6a-17b: Nūr al-shamʻah fī bayān ẓuhr al-Jumʻah.
4. leaves 18a-35a: Kitāb al-Nikāt fī al-masāʼil al-mushkilāt.
5. leaves 35b-38a: al-Luʼluʼ al-naẓīm fī rawm al-taʻallum wa-al-taʻlīm.
6. leaves 38b-50b: Ghāyat al-taḥqīq wa-nihāyat al-tadqīq fī masāʼil ibtalāʼ bi-hā ahl al-ḥaramayn al-sharīfayn.
7. leaves 51b-65a: Kitāb Zubdat al-aḥkām fī madhāhib al-aʼimmah al-arbaʻah al-aʻlām / ʻUmar ibn Isḥaq al-Ghaznawī.
8. leaves 65b-81b: al-Fawākih al-Badrīyah fī al-aqḍiyah al-ḥukmīyah.
11. leaves 97b-117a: Masāʼil ʻAbd Allāh ibn Salām.
12. leaves 118a-159b: al-Istikhrāj fī baʻḍ aḥādīth ṣāḥib al-miʻrāj.
15. leaves 199b-219b: Kitāb Kanz al-ḥaqāʼiq ... / al-Ghazzālī. Abridged and paraphrased version of the author's al-Durrah al-fākhirah fī kashf ʻulūm al-ākhirah.
subject: Bukhārī, Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl, 810-870
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
